action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A small bathroom with a window covered by blinds. There is a toilet beneath the window, a towel rack above the toilet, and a toilet paper holder on the wall next to the toilet. The room has light-colored walls and tiles, and there is a door partially open on the right side. Sunlight is streaming in through the window, casting shadows on the floor and fixtures.

The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A small bathroom with a pedestal sink and a toilet. The floor is wooden, and there is a mirror above the sink. The walls are light-colored. There is a partial view of a kitchen or another room through an open door.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A small bathroom with a window covered by blinds. There is a toilet beneath the window, a towel rack above the toilet, and a toilet paper holder on the wall next to the toilet. The room has light-colored walls and tiles, and there is a door partially open on the right side. Sunlight is streaming in through the window, casting shadows on the floor and fixtures.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there a pedestal sink in your image?

This is my DESCRIPTION: A small bathroom with a pedestal sink and a toilet. The floor is wooden, and there is a mirror above the sink. The walls are light-colored. There is a partial view of a kitchen or another room through an open door.

Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there a window in your image?

ANSWER: No

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
